title: Atlas of early printing
content:
[http://atlas.lib.uiowa.edu/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140730160139/http:/atlas.lib.uiowa.edu/ "http://atlas.lib.uiowa.edu/")

Fun, I think. Toggle the red button for printing presses, yellow for paper mills, blue for universities. The slider along the top, in 5-year increments, shows the tremendous change from 1460 to 1500.

Another good thing out of the University of Iowa, along with Rich Hendel's new book

[http://www.uiowapress.org/books/2013-spring/aspects-contemporary-book-de...](http://web.archive.org/web/20140730160139/http:/www.uiowapress.org/books/2013-spring/aspects-contemporary-book-design.htm "http://www.uiowapress.org/books/2013-spring/aspects-contemporary-book-design.htm")
author: charles ellertson
